title: The One With the Baby on the Bus

questions.question: What does Monica say to Ben to try to comfort him?
questions.explanation: Monica tries to comfort Ben by saying 'Who da wenny-Benny boy?'

questions.question: Why does Ross think Ben doesn't like Monica?
options: Because Monica is not his real mother
Because Monica doesn't know how to take care of him
Because Ben is being Mr. Crankypants
Because Monica is not feeding him
questions.correct_answer: Because Ben is being Mr. Crankypants
questions.explanation: Ross thinks Ben is just being cranky, which is why he doesn't like Monica

questions.question: What is Ross allergic to?
questions.explanation: Ross is allergic to kiwi, which is an ingredient in Monica's pie

questions.question: Why does Phoebe get upset with Terry?
options: Because Terry doesn't like her music
Because Terry is paying another musician to play at Central Perk
Because Terry doesn't want Phoebe to play at Central Perk
Because Terry wants Phoebe to play for free
questions.correct_answer: Because Terry is paying another musician to play at Central Perk
questions.explanation: Phoebe gets upset because Terry is paying another musician to play at Central Perk, implying that Phoebe is not good enough

questions.question: What do Chandler and Joey use to try to pick up women?
questions.explanation: Chandler and Joey use Ben to try to pick up women, thinking that women will find them more attractive if they are caring for a baby

questions.question: What happens to Ross when he gets a shot for his kiwi allergy?
questions.explanation: After getting the shot, Ross's speech returns to normal, and he is no longer struggling to pronounce words

questions.question: Why does Phoebe start playing her music on the sidewalk?
options: Because she wants to make more money
Because she wants to get more attention
Because Terry won't let her play at Central Perk
Because she wants to play for a different audience
questions.correct_answer: Because Terry won't let her play at Central Perk
questions.explanation: Phoebe starts playing on the sidewalk because Terry won't let her play at Central Perk, and she wants to continue sharing her music

questions.question: What do Chandler and Joey do when they realize they left Ben on the bus?
options: They go back to Central Perk
They start searching the city for Ben
questions.explanation: Chandler and Joey call the Transit Authority to try to locate Ben and get him back

questions.question: How do Chandler and Joey decide which baby is Ben?
questions.explanation: Chandler and Joey flip a coin to decide which baby is Ben, as they are unable to determine which one is the real Ben

questions.question: What song does Phoebe teach Stephanie to play?
questions.explanation: Phoebe teaches Stephanie how to play 'Smelly Cat', one of Phoebe's signature songs

questions.question: Why does Ross's speech become distorted?
options: Because he is allergic to kiwi
questions.correct_answer: Because he is allergic to kiwi
questions.explanation: Ross's speech becomes distorted because he is allergic to kiwi and his body is reacting to the allergen

questions.question: What does Monica say to Ross when he is getting a shot?
options: Don't squeeze my hand so hard
questions.correct_answer: Don't squeeze my hand so hard
questions.explanation: Monica tells Ross to stop squeezing her hand so hard while he is getting the shot

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Rachel about playing for money?
options: It's the best way to get noticed
It's the only way to make a living
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that playing for money is not good for her, as it changes her motivation for playing music

questions.question: What does Chandler say to the taxi driver?
questions.explanation: Chandler tells the taxi driver that they are just practicing, implying that they are not actually going anywhere

questions.question: What does Joey say to the girls on the bus?
questions.explanation: Joey tells the girls on the bus that they are two heterosexual guys, trying to appear attractive and available

questions.question: What does Ross say to Monica about his childhood?
options: He stuck a broom in her bike spokes
He cut the legs off her Malibu Ken
He teased her about her clothes
questions.correct_answer: He cut the legs off her Malibu Ken
questions.explanation: Ross tells Monica that he cut the legs off her Malibu Ken when they were kids

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Stephanie about her guitar?
questions.explanation: Phoebe mentions that Stephanie's guitar doesn't have a strap, and that her own guitar does

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey about the baby's clothes?
options: The baby is wearing a funny hat
The baby's clothes are very colorful
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that the baby is wearing a shirt with ducks on it, and that it's cute

questions.question: What does Ross say to Monica about his allergy?
questions.explanation: Ross tells Monica that he's allergic to kiwi, which is an ingredient in her pie

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Rachel about her music?
options: She's very good at playing the guitar
She's very bad at playing the guitar
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that she hates playing for money, as it changes her motivation for playing music

questions.question: What does Chandler say to the Transit Authority guy?
options: We're the fathers of the baby
We're the uncles of the baby
We're the friends of the baby's parents
questions.correct_answer: We're the uncles of the baby
questions.explanation: Chandler tells the Transit Authority guy that they are the uncles of the baby, trying to appear responsible and caring

questions.question: What does Joey say to the girls on the bus about Ben?
questions.explanation: Joey tells the girls on the bus that Ben is their friend's baby, trying to appear attractive and available

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Stephanie about 'Smelly Cat'?
options: It's a very easy song to play
It's a very hard song to play
questions.correct_answer: It's a very hard song to play
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Stephanie that 'Smelly Cat' is a hard song to play, implying that it requires a lot of skill and practice

options: He stuck a broom in her bike spokes
He cut the legs off her Malibu Ken
He teased her about her clothes
questions.correct_answer: He stuck a broom in her bike spokes
questions.explanation: Ross tells Monica that he stuck a broom in her bike spokes when they were kids

options: We should ask the Transit Authority
We should look for a birthmark
We should check the baby's clothes
questions.explanation: Chandler suggests flipping a coin to decide which baby is Ben, as they are unable to determine which one is the real Ben

questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that playing on the sidewalk is very liberating, as she can play her music without worrying about what others think

options: He's sorry for breaking her hand
He's sorry for not being there for her
questions.correct_answer: He's sorry for breaking her hand
questions.explanation: Ross tells Monica that he's sorry for breaking her hand, which happened when he was getting a shot for his kiwi allergy
